detectors.description: rrfAdvancedToken (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/41/41953ec19d37e16a71695a7d36a2bef19089148f_Tokenrrf.sol#188-257) has incorrect ERC20 function interface:Tokenrrf.transfer(address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/41/41953ec19d37e16a71695a7d36a2bef19089148f_Tokenrrf.sol#97-99)

owned.transferOwnership(address) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/41/41953ec19d37e16a71695a7d36a2bef19089148f_Tokenrrf.sol#26-28) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/41/41953ec19d37e16a71695a7d36a2bef19089148f_Tokenrrf.sol#27)

owned.transferOwnership(address).newOwner (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/41/41953ec19d37e16a71695a7d36a2bef19089148f_Tokenrrf.sol#26) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/41/41953ec19d37e16a71695a7d36a2bef19089148f_Tokenrrf.sol#27)
Tokenrrf._transfer(address,address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/41/41953ec19d37e16a71695a7d36a2bef19089148f_Tokenrrf.sol#71-87) is never used and should be removed
